That is incredibly cute!   I loves it!!!   And that lil fundoshi ^.^   This is hours of fun and cuteness for me!   

Mmm, may I suggest something that might improve your daughter's work?   If she can make it so that somehow you can scroll the clothes.   I found it a bit difficult to scroll for his handsome attire.

bsher213 <bsher213@...> wrote:                                  My daughter made a flash video game with a chibi version of the
 character from my book featuring the Shinsengumi 
 
 Play Dress (and undress) the Kae (complete with cute fundoshi)!
 http://img253.imageshack.us/my.php?image=kaemondressupcm1.swf&width=800
